testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Discover testimonials from our satisfied customers who trust us for their equestrian transport needs.

testimonial1.name: Marie Dubois
testimonial1.content: Excellent quality and exceptional service. My HorseMobil van allows me to travel with complete peace of mind with my horses. The German finish makes all the difference.

testimonial2.name: Pierre Martin
testimonial2.content: A perfect investment for our activity. The horse truck we bought perfectly meets our professional transport needs.

testimonial3.name: Sophie Laurent
testimonial3.content: Remarkable customer service and very high quality vehicles. I highly recommend HorseMobil for all your equestrian transport needs.

testimonial4.name: Thomas Weber
testimonial4.content: Exceptional reliability and comfort. Our competition trips are now a pleasure thanks to our new HorseMobil van.

footer.description: German specialist in high-end equestrian vehicles. We offer complete solutions for transporting your horses with German quality and reliability.
footer.newsletter_description: Receive our latest news and special offers.
footer.newsletter_success_description: You will soon receive our latest news.

hero.title: About Us
hero.description: For 15 years, we have been supporting equestrian and travel enthusiasts in realizing their custom vehicle projects.

mission.title: Your project, our expertise
mission.description1: At HORSEMOBIL, we believe that every enthusiast deserves a vehicle that matches their ambitions. Whether you are a professional rider, enlightened amateur or adventurer seeking freedom, we put our know-how at your service.
mission.description2: Our team of experts combines traditional craftsmanship and technological innovations to create unique vehicles, perfectly adapted to your specific needs.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: A team passionate about automobiles and specialized vehicle conversion

confidentialite.title: Privacy Policy
confidentialite.subtitle: HORSEMOBIL is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph1: This privacy policy describes how HORSEMOBIL collects, uses and protects your personal information when you use our website or services.
introduction.paragraph2: By using our website, you accept the practices described in this privacy policy. If you do not accept these practices, please do not use our site.
introduction.paragraph3: This policy complies with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and French Data Protection Act.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Information about the use of cookies and similar technologies on our site

whatIsCookie.title: What is a cookie?
whatIsCookie.paragraph1: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit our website. It allows us to recognize your browser and remember certain information about you or your preferences.
whatIsCookie.paragraph2: Cookies facilitate your navigation, help secure your connection and help us better understand how our site is used to improve it.

cgu.title: Terms and Conditions of Use
cgu.subtitle: Rules and conditions for using the HORSEMOBIL website

preamble.title: Preamble
preamble.paragraph1: These General Terms of Use (GTU) govern access to and use of the horsemobil.fr website, published by HORSEMOBIL SARL.
preamble.paragraph2: Access to the site implies full acceptance of these GTU. If you do not accept these conditions, we ask you not to use this site.
preamble.paragraph3: HORSEMOBIL reserves the right to modify these GTU at any time. Modifications take effect as soon as they are published on the site.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: This entire site is subject to French and international legislation on copyright and intellectual property. All reproduction rights are reserved, including for downloadable documents and iconographic and photographic representations.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: The reproduction of all or part of this site on any electronic medium is formally prohibited except with express authorization from the publication director.
intellectualProperty.paragraph3: The trademarks and logos appearing on the site are registered by HORSEMOBIL or possibly by partners. Any total or partial reproduction of these trademarks or logos, made from site elements without express authorization from HORSEMOBIL is therefore prohibited.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.paragraph1: The information contained on this site is as accurate as possible and the site is updated at different periods of the year, but may nevertheless contain inaccuracies or omissions.
responsibility.paragraph2: If you notice a gap, error or what appears to be a malfunction, please report it by email to contact@horsemobil.fr, describing the problem as precisely as possible.
responsibility.paragraph3: HORSEMOBIL cannot be held responsible for direct and indirect damage caused to the user's equipment when accessing the website, resulting either from the use of equipment that does not meet the specified specifications, or from the appearance of a bug or incompatibility.

links.title: Hyperlinks
links.paragraph1: Hyperlinks may be present on the site. The user is informed that by clicking on these links, they will leave the horsemobil.fr site. The latter has no control over the web pages to which these links lead and cannot, under any circumstances, be responsible for their content.
links.paragraph2: Establishing a link to the horsemobil.fr site must be subject to a prior authorization request. This authorization can be requested by contacting the following email address: contact@horsemobil.fr.
links.paragraph3: HORSEMOBIL reserves the right to request the removal of a link that it considers not to comply with the purpose of the site.

law.title: Applicable Law and Competent Jurisdiction
law.content: French legislation applies to this contract. In the absence of an amicable resolution of a dispute arising between the parties, French courts will have sole jurisdiction. For any questions relating to the application of these Terms of Use, you can contact the publisher at the contact details listed in the "Contact" section.

update.title: Update
update.paragraph1: These legal notices may be subject to change, particularly to comply with any new regulations in force.
